scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara provides pose instructions to Ninomae Ina'nis during her 3D showcase.
Ina talks about the difficulty of 'Idol poses' while transitioning to the next guest.
Amelia Watson shares a heartfelt message and requests Ina to perform a plank and 'the worm'.
Ina reacts to Amelia's message and prepares for the next guest.
Mori Calliope gives a touching speech about their friendship and challenges Ina to do 'the worm' or 'the splits'.
Ina attempts to perform the splits as requested by Calliope.

subtitles.original: Instructions for camera?
subtitles.english: Instructions for camera?

subtitles.original: Yeah, and now Ina...
subtitles.english: Yeah, and now Ina...

subtitles.original: ...put your hands together like you're praying.
subtitles.english: ...put your hands together like you're praying.

subtitles.original: Okay, and do a pouty face.
subtitles.english: Okay, and do a pouty face.

subtitles.original: As if you're asking the viewer for some... something.
subtitles.english: As if you're asking the viewer for some... something.

subtitles.original: Yes, cookies, like "Onegai"? "Onegai"?
subtitles.english: Yes, cookies, like "Please"? "Please"?

subtitles.original: Credit card number, please!
subtitles.english: Credit card number, please!

subtitles.original: Keep on doing that. Alright.
subtitles.english: Keep on doing that. Alright.

subtitles.original: Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Bye Kiara! Thank you!
subtitles.english: Bye Kiara! Thank you!

subtitles.original: CHALLENGE
subtitles.english: CHALLENGE

subtitles.original: Yeah, Kiara flew over to, you know, somewhere else for now.
subtitles.english: Yeah, Kiara flew over to, you know, somewhere else for now.

subtitles.original: But yeah, thank you Kiara.
subtitles.english: But yeah, thank you Kiara.

subtitles.original: Oh, Idol pose, Idol pose is always tough, you know? But I'll try.
subtitles.english: Oh, Idol pose, Idol pose is always tough, you know? But I'll try.

subtitles.original: Okay, who do we have next? Ame!
subtitles.english: Okay, who do we have next? Ame!

subtitles.original: Hi Ina!
subtitles.english: Hi Ina!

subtitles.original: Ame!
subtitles.english: Ame!

subtitles.original: I'm so proud of you!
subtitles.english: I'm so proud of you!

subtitles.original: Oh, thank you Ame!
subtitles.english: Oh, thank you Ame!

subtitles.original: I know it takes a lot of courage to get up and do this stuff in front of a lot of people.
subtitles.english: I know it takes a lot of courage to get up and do this stuff in front of a lot of people.

subtitles.original: You finally made it! Yay!
subtitles.english: You finally made it! Yay!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: I love watching you move and wave around, the thing you do with your arms, the Wiggle!
subtitles.english: I love watching you move and wave around, the thing you do with your arms, the Wiggle!

subtitles.original: You know, I already know, you look so cute doing it too.
subtitles.english: You know, I already know, you look so cute doing it too.

subtitles.original: So my pose request is first, you gotta plank.
subtitles.english: So my pose request is first, you gotta plank.

subtitles.original: That's right, you gotta get down on the ground and do that trend that people did a long time ago.
subtitles.english: That's right, you gotta get down on the ground and do that trend that people did a long time ago.

subtitles.original: This is just the first step, okay?
subtitles.english: This is just the first step, okay?

subtitles.original: Okay, okay.
subtitles.english: Okay, okay.

subtitles.original: I'll wait. Are you there yet?
subtitles.english: I'll wait. Are you there yet?

subtitles.original: No...
subtitles.english: No...

subtitles.original: Okay, okay. Then, if staff doesn't yell at you...
subtitles.english: Okay, okay. Then, if staff doesn't yell at you...

subtitles.original: ...you gotta do the worm!
subtitles.english: ...you gotta do the worm!

subtitles.original: Oh no, staff already is yelling at me, it seems I cannot do the worm.
subtitles.english: Oh no, staff already is yelling at me, it seems I cannot do the worm.

subtitles.original: Okay, I can do this though, I can... yes.
subtitles.english: Okay, I can do this though, I can... yes.

subtitles.original: Is it more of like a full body wave?
subtitles.english: Is it more of like a full body wave?

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah. Ina and her waving arms, tentacles always.
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. Ina and her waving arms, tentacles always.

subtitles.original: She does it too! And back... and back.
subtitles.english: She does it too! And back... and back.

subtitles.original: Well, hopefully that wasn't too difficult of a pose.
subtitles.english: Well, hopefully that wasn't too difficult of a pose.

subtitles.original: Thank you Ina.
subtitles.english: Thank you Ina.

subtitles.original: Thank you Ame! Love you!
subtitles.english: Thank you Ame! Love you!

subtitles.original: Goodbye! I love you Ame! I love you!
subtitles.english: Goodbye! I love you Ame! I love you!

subtitles.original: Oh Ame... Oh Ame is so cute.
subtitles.english: Oh Ame... Oh Ame is so cute.

subtitles.original: I can't wait to see her showcase as well!
subtitles.english: I can't wait to see her showcase as well!

subtitles.original: Okay, who do we have next? Oh, from Calli!
subtitles.english: Okay, who do we have next? Oh, from Calli!

subtitles.original: Hello there Ina, Ina, Ina!
subtitles.english: Hello there Ina, Ina, Ina!

subtitles.original: Hi Calli!
subtitles.english: Hi Calli!

subtitles.original: It's me, your boy, your reaper, Mori Calliope of the Myth generation, same one as you! Wow!
subtitles.english: It's me, your boy, your reaper, Mori Calliope of the Myth generation, same one as you! Wow!

subtitles.original: Oh man, I have a lot to say, but I feel like it might end up being redundant or unnecessary.
subtitles.english: Oh man, I have a lot to say, but I feel like it might end up being redundant or unnecessary.

subtitles.original: So I'm just gonna say thanks for being a shoulder for me to lean on, quite literally sometimes.
subtitles.english: So I'm just gonna say thanks for being a shoulder for me to lean on, quite literally sometimes.

subtitles.original: We've had so much fun together between Guilty Gear Strive and playing recorders together...
subtitles.english: We've had so much fun together between Guilty Gear Strive and playing recorders together...

subtitles.original: ...and hopefully soon we can do the ukulele thing.
subtitles.english: ...and hopefully soon we can do the ukulele thing.

subtitles.original: Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: But until then, I just want to let you know that you're a great friend that I can always depend upon...
subtitles.english: But until then, I just want to let you know that you're a great friend that I can always depend upon...

subtitles.original: ...and I never feel weird talking to you ever.
subtitles.english: ...and I never feel weird talking to you ever.

subtitles.original: Like, it's always really chill and laid back, and I think it's 'cause you remind me of my art friends from the past.
subtitles.english: Like, it's always really chill and laid back, and I think it's 'cause you remind me of my art friends from the past.

subtitles.original: So you're a very important person to me.
subtitles.english: So you're a very important person to me.

subtitles.original: And so, since I feel so comfortable around you, I'm gonna ask you to do some poses...
subtitles.english: And so, since I feel so comfortable around you, I'm gonna ask you to do some poses...

subtitles.original: ...that make you feel uncomfortable. But not in like a weird way...
subtitles.english: ...that make you feel uncomfortable. But not in like a weird way...

subtitles.original: ...like in like a way where like it's hard for you to do them.
subtitles.english: ...like in like a way where like it's hard for you to do them.

subtitles.original: Because everybody here is gonna be asking you to do like cute things, I'm sure, right?
subtitles.english: Because everybody here is gonna be asking you to do like cute things, I'm sure, right?

subtitles.original: Well, I'm here to dish out the real challenges, 'cause life is full of challenges, you know?
subtitles.english: Well, I'm here to dish out the real challenges, 'cause life is full of challenges, you know?

subtitles.original: So... I'm gonna ask you to do the worm.
subtitles.english: So... I'm gonna ask you to do the worm.

subtitles.original: Can you do the worm, Cali... Ina?
subtitles.english: Can you do the worm, Cali... Ina?

subtitles.original: Calli! I can't do the worm!
subtitles.english: Calli! I can't do the worm!

subtitles.original: I can only do this! I can only do this!
subtitles.english: I can only do this! I can only do this!

subtitles.original: I'm guessing the worm might be a little difficult for you, but I want to see you put your back into it, you know? Give it your all.
subtitles.english: I'm guessing the worm might be a little difficult for you, but I want to see you put your back into it, you know? Give it your all.

subtitles.original: But in the event that you can't do the worm, that's okay, I've prepared a second choice.
subtitles.english: But in the event that you can't do the worm, that's okay, I've prepared a second choice.

subtitles.original: You may choose between the worm or the splits.
subtitles.english: You may choose between the worm or the splits.

subtitles.original: She's gonna get me back for this one, isn't she? Oh god.
subtitles.english: She's gonna get me back for this one, isn't she? Oh god.

subtitles.original: Just you wait Mori Calliope!
subtitles.english: Just you wait Mori Calliope!

subtitles.original: You should have been nicer to me!
subtitles.english: You should have been nicer to me!

subtitles.original: I should be nicer to her today because she's the first one debuting 3D, oh man, I'm gonna be in big trouble.
subtitles.english: I should be nicer to her today because she's the first one debuting 3D, oh man, I'm gonna be in big trouble.

subtitles.original: Okay, look, Ina. Splits are good for you.
subtitles.english: Okay, look, Ina. Splits are good for you.

subtitles.original: They can be good for you. For your health.
subtitles.english: They can be good for you. For your health.

subtitles.original: Make you flexible, right?
subtitles.english: Make you flexible, right?

subtitles.original: That's not in my dictionary.
subtitles.english: That's not in my dictionary.

subtitles.original: You'll thank me later. Okay, I'll try not to stretch your muscles too bad, whichever one you choose, okay?
subtitles.english: You'll thank me later. Okay, I'll try not to stretch your muscles too bad, whichever one you choose, okay?

subtitles.original: I'll try, okay.
subtitles.english: I'll try, okay.

subtitles.original: If that happens, I'll give you a massage to make up for it, okay? That's a good deal, though.
subtitles.english: If that happens, I'll give you a massage to make up for it, okay? That's a good deal, though.

subtitles.original: Not quite as good as Gura, but still.
subtitles.english: Not quite as good as Gura, but still.

subtitles.original: You can count on me, just like I can count on you. Good luck!
subtitles.english: You can count on me, just like I can count on you. Good luck!

subtitles.original: Thank you Calli! Oh, she disappeared.
subtitles.english: Thank you Calli! Oh, she disappeared.

subtitles.original: Alright. Well, I can't do the worm, so I'll try the splits. I'll try the splits.
subtitles.english: Alright. Well, I can't do the worm, so I'll try the splits. I'll try the splits.
